item.title: Netanyahu fires Israel's security chief over 'distrust'
item.description: The Israeli PM cited Shin Bet's failure to anticipate the 7 October attack - but the move has sparked outrage and protests.

item.title: Tesla vandals face up to 20 years in prison, says attorney general
item.description: The US attorney general said a wave of vandalism and arson attacks at Tesla dealerships is "domestic terrorism".

item.title: Trump says judge in migrant deportations case is 'Grandstander'
item.description: The judge says the government's filing in the case is "woefully insufficient", but Trump calls him a "Grandstander".

item.title: Why Elon Musk's Grok is kicking up a storm in India
item.description: The chatbot has become an "unfiltered and unhinged" digital sensation in India.

item.title: Trump signs order to begin dismantling of US education department
item.description: The move, which he promised to do on the campaign trail, is already facing legal challenges.
